author: sebb
msg: Move XMLHelper initialisation from ScriptEngineManager to static block in XMLHelper class:
- code did not belong in JSR-223 implementation
- code now works even for Java 1.6+ (which do not use the BSF version of ScriptEngineManager)

author: bentmann
msg: [MNG-4678] CLI: AbstractConsoleDownloadMonitor, BatchModeDownloadMonitor output download progress to STDOUT

author: veithen
msg: * Completed the contract of CustomBuilder with a precise specification about how XOP (or other forms of optimized binary content) is handled.
* Added code that allows CustomBuilder (and other code) to get an XOP encoded reader in a well defined way. In particular, it will unwrap XOPDecodingStreamReader if necessary.
* Added an integration test that demonstrates this with JAXB2.
